short_description.en: Up to 100% project cost, up to $8,000 for an ENERGY STAR certified electric heat pump, for income-qualified residents.
Free home energy assessment - prerequisite for other program rebates. For income-qualified residents.
Up to 100% project cost, up to $2,500 for electrical wiring, for income-qualified residents.
Up to 100% project cost, up to $4,000 for an electrical panel, for income-qualified residents.
Up to 100% project cost, up to $1,600 for ENERGY STAR certified insulation, mechanical ventilation products and air sealing. Income qualified.
Up to 100% project cost, up to $1,750 for an ENERGY STAR certified electric heat pump water heater. For income-qualified residents.
Up to 100% project cost, up to $840 for an ENERGY STAR certified heat pump dryer or combo washer/dryer. For income-qualified residents.
Up to 100% project cost, up to $840 for an ENERGY STAR certified electric range or cooktop. For income-qualified residents.
Up to 100% of project costs, up to $16,000 for whole home energy upgrades, for income-qualified residents.
Free home energy assessment - prerequisite for other program rebates. For moderate-income residents.
Up to 50% of project cost, up to $8,000 for an ENERGY STAR certified electric heat pump. For moderate-income residents.
Up to 50% project cost, up to $2,500 for electrical wiring. For moderate-income residents.
Up to 50% project cost, up to $4,000 for an electrical panel. For moderate-income residents.
Up to 50% project cost, up to $1,600 for insulation, mechanical ventilation products and air sealing, for moderate income residents.
Up to 50% project cost, up to $1,750 for an ENERGY STAR certified electric heat pump water heater. For moderate-income residents.
Up to 50% project cost, up to $840 for an ENERGY STAR certified heat pump dryer or combo washer/dryer. For moderate-income residents.
Up to 50% project cost, up to $840 for an ENERGY STAR certified electric range or cooktop. For moderate-income residents.
Up to 50% of project cost, up to $16,000 for whole home energy upgrades. For moderate income residents.
$50 rebate for a smart thermostat, and $50 a year for enrolling in Connect to Save.
$300 rebate for a qualified heat pump water heater.
$400 rebate for installing a new qualifying heat pump, or replacing an existing HVAC system with a qualifying heat pump.
Up to $400 rebate for a heat pump for existing homes or new construction.
$500 rebate for a geothermal heat pump.
Up to $150 rebate for an electric water heater.
$150 rebate for a high efficiency electric water heater.
$100/ton, up to $400 rebate for a central heat pump with heat strips.
Up to $400 rebate for an electric heat pump in an existing home or new construction.
$500 rebate for a geothermal heat pump.
$150 rebate for an electric water heater.
$700 rebate for attic insulation and air sealing.
$350 rebate for duct sealing.
Up to $400 rebate for replacing a central air conditioner upon failure of previous unit, depending on efficiency rating.
Up to $700 rebate for replacing an air-source heat pump upon failure of previous unit, depending on efficiency rating.
$700 rebate for replacement of mini-split heat pump ducted or multi-head unit upon failure, for whole-home conditioning.
Up to $500 for the early replacement of existing equipment with a central air conditioner, amount dependent on efficiency rating.
Up to $900 for the early replacement of existing equipment with an air-source heat pump, amount dependent on efficiency rating.
$900 rebate for the early replacement of existing unit with a mini-split heat pump ducted or multi-head for whole-home conditioning.
Up to $2,500 for an air-source heat pump conversion to dual fuel.
$1,500 for an electric furnace/radiant heating conversion to air-source heat pump.
Up to $2,400 for an air-source heat pump conversion to a cold climate heat pump (COP 2 or above).
Up to $2,500 for an air-source heat pump conversion to a geothermal heat pump.
$125 rebate for a smart thermostat. Must be purchased along with eligible HVAC equipment.
$500 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
$700 rebate for attic insulation and air sealing.
$350 rebate for duct sealing.
Up to $400 rebate for replacing a central air conditioner upon failure of previous unit, depending on efficiency rating.
Up to $700 rebate for replacing an air-source heat pump upon failure of previous unit, depending on efficiency rating.
$700 rebate for replacement of mini-split heat pump ducted or multi-head unit upon failure, for whole-home conditioning.
Up to $500 for the early replacement of existing equipment with a central air conditioner, amount dependent on efficiency rating.
Up to $900 for the early replacement of existing equipment with an air-source heat pump, amount dependent on efficiency rating.
$900 rebate for the early replacement of existing unit with a mini-split heat pump ducted or multi-head for whole-home conditioning.
Up to $2,500 for an air-source heat pump conversion to dual fuel.
$1,500 for an electric furnace/radiant heating conversion to air-source heat pump.
Up to $2,400 for an air-source heat pump conversion to a cold climate heat pump (COP 2 or above).
Up to $2,500 for an air-source heat pump conversion to geothermal heat pump.
$125 rebate for a smart thermostat. Must be purchased along with eligible HVAC equipment.
$500 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
Up to $300 rebate for a heat pump, amount dependent on efficiency rating.
short_description.es: Reembolso de hasta $300 por una bomba de calor, el monto depende de la clasificación de eficiencia.

short_description.en: $15 rebate for a high efficiency central AC unit.
$60 rebate for a high efficiency heat pump.
$250 rebate for a geothermal heat pump.
$25 rebate available for air sealing.
$50 rebate for duct sealing or replacement.
$100 rebate for insulation, including attic/ceiling and floor/crawl space insulation.
$100 rebate for a smart thermostat upon entering in PEMC's Smart Thermostat Savings Program.
Up to $600 for installing an electric heat pump.
$50 rebate for purchasing or leasing a plug-in electric vehicle.
$100 rebate for an ENERGY STAR rated heat pump water heater.
$100 rebate for attic air insulation or duct sealing.
Free home energy audit for Randolph EMC members.
$300 rebate available for low-income weatherization, including air/duct sealing, insulation, HVAC tune-up/replacement, and programmable thermostat.
$150 rebate for a solar water heating system.
$150 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
Up to $200 rebate for an air source or dual fuel heat pump.
$300 rebate for a geothermal heat pump.
$75 rebate for a central AC unit in a manufactured home.
$2 per square foot, up to $200 for energy efficient exterior windows.
Up to $150 for air source heat pump installations.
$300 for geothermal heat pump installations, qualifying dual fuel heat pump installations, and hyper-heating, whole house heat pump systems.
$300 rebate for a heat pump water heater installation.
$250 rebate for ENERGY STAR rated central AC units, air-to-air heat pumps, or geothermal heat pumps.
$300 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
$25 rebate for ENERGY STAR certified appliances including washers/dryers, refrigerators, and water heaters.
$250 rebate for installing a Level 2 electric vehicle charger.
$50 bill credit for purchasing ENERGY STAR appliances, including clothes washers and dryers, dishwashers, freezers, and refrigerators.
$100/ton rebate for installing a heat pump.
$300 rebate for an ENERGY STAR heat pump water heater.
Up to $500 rebate to purchase and install an at-home EV charging station.
$25 bill credit for electric or batter-powered lawn equipment.
$50 rebate for a smart thermostat after enrolling in the Connect to Save program.
Up to $400 rebate on new HVAC equipment.
Up to $200 bill credit for the replacement of HVAC ductwork that is greater than 15 years old.
Earn a bill credit of up to $250 by increasing the R-value of the insulation in both your attic and crawlspace.
Up to $400 upfront rebate for installing an ENERGY STAR® certified heat pump water heater when replacing an electric water heater.
Receive no-cost energy efficient weatherization upgrades for qualified income and age levels by qualified service providers.
short_description.es: Reciba sin costo alguno actualizaciones de sus instalaciones de climatización si cumple los requisitos de nivel de ingresos o de edad realizados por proveedores de servicios competentes.

short_description.en: Earn a $50 rebate and $4 per month for enrolling your Smart Thermostat in Connect to Save.
$500 bill credit for costs associated with the installation of in-home wiring for Level 2 EV charging.
